OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum rental payments in aggregate as of the balance sheet date under operating leases.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Current
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within one year of the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fifth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fourth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the third year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the second year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum lease payments receivable under operating leases for periods greater than five years following the balance sheet date.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OtherAmortizationOfDeferredCharges.label: Amortization of Other Deferred Charges
OtherAmortizationOfDeferredCharges.description: Amount of amortization of other deferred costs recognized in the income statement.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsFairValueDisclosure.label: Other Assets, Fair Value Disclosure
OtherAssetsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of other assets.

OtherAssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.label: Other Assets Held-for-sale, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
OtherAssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.description: The lower of the carrying value or fair value less cost to sell of current assets held for sale that are not elsewhere specified in the taxonomy. The carrying value of major classes of assets and liabilities of the disposal group are separately disclosed in the balance sheet in the specific concepts provided.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQuali.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQuali.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss), attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQuali.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQuali.description: Net of tax effect change in accumulated gains and losses from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges after taxes. A cash flow hedge is a hedge of the exposure to variability in the cash flows of a recognized asset or liability or a forecasted transaction that is attributable to a particular risk. The change includes an entity's share of an equity investee's increase or decrease in deferred hedging gains or losses. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and before reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue.label: Other Cost of Operating Revenue
OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue.description: Other costs incurred during the reporting period related to other revenue generating activities.

OtherDeferredCostsGross.label: Other Deferred Costs, Gross
OtherDeferredCostsGross.description: Gross amount of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs or deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies.

OtherDeferredCostsNet.label: Other Deferred Costs, Net
OtherDeferredCostsNet.description: Net amount of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs or deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies.

OtherNonoperatingGainsLosses.label: Other Nonoperating Gains (Losses)
OtherNonoperatingGainsLosses.description: Amount of gain (loss) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherPostretirementDefinedBenefitPlanLia.label: Liability, Other Postretirement Defined Benefit Plan, Noncurrent
OtherPostretirementDefinedBenefitPlanLia.description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit other postretirement plan, classified as noncurrent. Excludes pension plan.

OwnedPropertyManagementCosts.label: Owned Property Management Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OwnedPropertyManagementCosts.description: The aggregate costs related to management of owned properties during the reporting period.

PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payment of Financing and Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentOfFinancingAndStockIssuanceCosts.description: The total of the cash outflow during the period which has been paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt and the cost incurred directly for the issuance of equity securities.

PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.label: Payments for Capital Improvements
PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of or capital improvements to properties held for investment (operating, managed, leased) or for use.

PaymentsForDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisiti.label: Payments for Deposits on Real Estate Acquisitions
PaymentsForDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisiti.description: Cash outflow related to amounts given in advance to show or confirm an intention to complete an acquisition of land, buildings, other structures, or any item classified as real estate.

PaymentsForHedgeFinancingActivities.label: Payments for Hedge, Financing Activities
PaymentsForHedgeFinancingActivities.description: The cash outflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either cash flow hedge, fair value hedge or hedge of net investment in foreign operations.

PaymentsForProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEst.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Deposits on Real Estate Acquisitions
PaymentsForProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEst.description: Net cash outflow or inflow from the amount given in advance to show intention to complete the acquisition piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets.label: Payments for Purchase of Other Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PaymentsForPurchaseOfOtherAssets.description: Cash paid to purchase assets other than those represented by other elements (securities, loans, mortgages, real estate).

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

PaymentsToAcquireAndDevelopRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire and Develop Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireAndDevelopRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land and anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth, and payments to develop real estate assets by adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements. Including real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excluding real estate acquired for use by the owner.

PaymentsToAcquireBuildings.label: Payments to Acquire Buildings
PaymentsToAcquireBuildings.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of buildings (properties) whether for investment or use.

PaymentsToAcquireCommercialRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Commercial Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireCommercialRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of property as primarily intended to generate income for its owner.

PaymentsToAcquireLand.label: Payments to Acquire Land
PaymentsToAcquireLand.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes land acquired for use by the owner.

PaymentsToAcquireLandHeldForUse.label: Payments to Acquire Land Held-for-use
PaymentsToAcquireLandHeldForUse.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of land for use; excludes purchases of land held as inventory or as investments.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Other Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireOtherProductiveAssets.description: Amount of cash outflow for the purchase of or improvements to tangible or intangible assets, used to produce goods or deliver services, classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth; includes real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes real estate acquired for use by the owner.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateAndRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate and Real Estate Joint Ventures
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateAndRealEstate.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held-for-investment and real estate joint ventures.

PaymentsToAcquireResidentialRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Residential Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireResidentialRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of residential property intended to generate income for the owner.

PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.label: Payments to Develop Real Estate Assets
PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.description: Payments to develop real estate assets is the process of adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements; and are generally classified as cash flow from investing activities.

PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.label: Payments to Noncontrolling Interests
PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash outflow to a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but not limited to, reduction of noncontrolling interest ownership. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitExpe.label: Pension and Other Postretirement Benefits Cost (Reversal of Cost)
PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitExpe.description: Amount of cost (reversal of cost) for pension and other postretirement benefits.

PostemploymentBenefitsLiabilityCurrentAn.label: Postemployment Benefits Liability
PostemploymentBenefitsLiabilityCurrentAn.description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.label: Prior Period Reclassification Adjustment
PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.description: The amount of a reclassification adjustment made to prior period financial statement amounts.

ProceedsFromConstructionLoansPayable.label: Proceeds from Construction Loans Payable
ProceedsFromConstructionLoansPayable.description: The cash inflow from borrowings to finance the cost of construction.

ProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEstateSales.label: Proceeds from Deposits on Real Estate Sales
ProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEstateSales.description: Cash inflow related to amounts received in advance from a potential buyer showing or confirming an intention to complete an acquisition of land, buildings, other structures, or any item classified as real estate.

ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.label: Proceeds from Insurance Settlement, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as investing activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStockDividen.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStockDividen.description: Amount of cash inflow from capital contributions to an entity associated with a dividend reinvestment plan.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Secured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Unsecured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt unsecured debt.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Long-term Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromOtherEquity.label: Proceeds from Other Equity
ProceedsFromOtherEquity.description: Amount of cash inflow from the issuance of equity classified as other.

ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholde.label: Proceeds from (Payments to) Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholde.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from (to) a noncontrolling interest. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDeb.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDeb.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from other long-term debt.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.label: Proceeds from Stock Options Exercised
ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.description: Amount of cash inflow from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

ProceedsFromUnsecuredNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Unsecured Notes Payable
ProceedsFromUnsecuredNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is uncollateralized (where debt is not backed by the pledge of collateral).

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeMaxim.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Useful Life, Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeMaxim.description: The maximum useful life of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include land, buildings, machinery and equipment, and other types of furniture and equipment including, but not limited to, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment and software.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeMinim.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Useful Life, Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeMinim.description: The minimum useful life of long lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include land, buildings, machinery and equipment, and other types of furniture and equipment including, but not limited to, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment and software.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation pertaining to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationDepreci.label: Real Estate Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationDepreci.description: Amount of depreciation expense for the period.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationOtherDe.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Other Deduction
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationOtherDe.description: Amount of other deductions to accumulated depreciation, excluding sales, for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationRealEst.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Investment in Real Estate Sold
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationRealEst.description: Amount of decrease to accumulated depreciation for real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAccu.label: Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Accumulated Depreciation (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAccu.description: The amount of accumulated depreciation for the property as of the balance sheet date.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Building and Improvements, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Land, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Carrying Amount of Land and Buildings and Improvements (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Gross amount at which land and buildings and improvements are carried at the end of the period for each property.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCost.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Improvements
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCost.description: Amount of land and buildings and improvements made to real estate investments and capitalized after acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Building and Improvements
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Land
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Cost of Investment in Real Estate Sold
RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold.description: Amount of real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis.label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate, Federal Income Tax Basis
RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis.description: Cost basis of real estate investments for federal income tax purposes for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Gross
RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.

RealEstateHeldforsale.label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
RealEstateHeldforsale.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

RealEstateImprovements.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Improvements
RealEstateImprovements.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments related to improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.label: Real Estate Investment Property, at Cost
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.description: Amount of real estate investment property which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestments.label: Real Estate Investments, Net
RealEstateInvestments.description: Amount of real estate investments, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; (7) other real estate investments; (8) real estate joint ventures; and (9) unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented.

RealEstateOtherAcquisitions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Acquisition
RealEstateOtherAcquisitions.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments from acquisitions other than through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateRevenueNet.label: Real Estate Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RealEstateRevenueNet.description: The aggregate revenue from real estate operations during the reporting period.

RealEstateTaxExpense.label: Real Estate Tax Expense
RealEstateTaxExpense.description: A tax based on the assessed value of real estate by the local government. The tax is usually based on the value of property (including the land).

RealEstateTaxesAndInsurance.label: Real Estate Taxes and Insurance
RealEstateTaxesAndInsurance.description: The aggregate total of real estate taxes and insurance expense.

RecoveryOfDirectCosts.label: Recovery of Direct Costs
RecoveryOfDirectCosts.description: Return of or reimbursements received in relation to direct costs and expenses previously paid or incurred.

RentalProperties.label: Rental Properties
RentalProperties.description: Carrying amount of income producing properties held for rental.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Long-term Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

RepaymentsOfUnsecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Unsecured Debt
RepaymentsOfUnsecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt unsecured debt.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.description: Amount of depreciation expense of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateNumberOfUnits.label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate, Number of Units
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateNumberOfUnits.description: Number of units of real estate held for investment for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

SecurityDepositLiability.label: Security Deposit Liability
SecurityDepositLiability.description: This element represents money paid in advance to protect the provider of a product or service, such as a lessor, against damage or nonpayment by the buyer or tenant (lessee) during the term of the agreement. Such damages may include physical damage to the property, theft of property, and other contractual breaches. Security deposits held may be interest or noninterest bearing.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Accelerated Cost
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of additional cost recognized for award under share-based payment arrangement from occurrence of event accelerating recognition of cost.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Fair value of share-based awards for which the grantee gained the right by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of accumulated difference between fair value of underlying shares on dates of exercise and exercise price on options exercised (or share units converted) into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares under the plan during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures and Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: For presentations that combine terminations, the number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan or that expired.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated during the reporting period due to noncompliance with plan terms during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Net of Forfeitures
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Net number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on stock options awarded under the plan during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Intrinsic Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of difference between fair value of the underlying shares reserved for issuance and exercise price of vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable.

SharesIssuedPricePerShare.label: Shares Issued, Price Per Share
SharesIssuedPricePerShare.description: Per share or per unit amount of equity securities issued.

SquareFootageOfRealEstateProperty.label: Square Footage of Real Estate Property (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
SquareFootageOfRealEstateProperty.description: The amount of square footage related to a real estate property.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesDividendRei.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesDividendRei.description: Number of shares issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the shareholders to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueDividendRein.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueDividendRein.description: Value of stock issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the holder of the stock to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period, net of the stock value of such awards forfeited.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

StraightLineRent.label: Straight Line Rent
StraightLineRent.description: Difference between actual rental income due and rental income recognized on a straight-line basis.

TenantReimbursements.label: Tenant Reimbursements (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
TenantReimbursements.description: In accordance with the provisions of their lease agreement, this element represents allowable charges due a landlord from its tenant. In retail store and office building leases, for example, tenant reimbursements may cover items such as taxes, utilities, and common area expenses.

UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.label: Unamortized Loan Commitment and Origination Fees and Unamortized Discounts or Premiums, Other (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.description: Reflects the cumulative amount of fees paid by borrowers, which relationship is not otherwise defined (such as commercial, consumer, or foreign), which have not yet been taken into income and unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, not otherwise categorized (such as commercial, consumer, or foreign), unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of loans, not otherwise categorized (such as commercial, consumer, or foreign), that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield.

UndistributedContinuingOperationEarnings.label: Undistributed Continuing Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Basic
UndistributedContinuingOperationEarnings.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to participating securities for basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarnin.label: Undistributed Discontinued Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Basic
UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarnin.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to participating securities for basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

UndistributedEarningsAllocatedToParticip.label: Undistributed Earnings Allocated to Participating Securities (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
UndistributedEarningsAllocatedToParticip.description: Earnings allocated (not distributed) to participating securities under the two-class method to the extent that participating securities may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Allocated to Participating Securities, Basic
UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

UnitsOfPartnershipInterestAmount.label: Units of Partnership Interest, Amount
UnitsOfPartnershipInterestAmount.description: The number of units or equivalent units outstanding for all classes.

UtilitiesOperatingExpense.label: Utilities Operating Expense
UtilitiesOperatingExpense.description: Amount of operating expense of regulated operation.

VariableInterestEntityOwnershipPercentag.label: Variable Interest Entity, Qualitative or Quantitative Information, Ownership Percentage
VariableInterestEntityOwnershipPercentag.description: Percentage of the Variable Interest Entity's (VIE) voting interest owned by (or beneficial interest in) the reporting entity (directly or indirectly).

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

VariableLeasePayment.label: Variable Lease, Payment
VariableLeasePayment.description: Amount of cash outflow for variable lease payment excluded from lease liability.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.
